Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory800.jpg'}
{3: 'Cradle Parade'}
{1: 'April 1st, early morning. One full year has passed by since the Gray Raven Commandant went missing.', 3: '60'}
{3: 'April 1st, early morning. One full year has passed by since the Gray Raven Commandant went missing.'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory616.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory616.jpg'}
{1: 'RImgBg1Shake'}
{3: "Containing the commandant's body, the whale-shaped coffin breaks free of the deep sea's confinement with the other 612 souls lost here."}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cg3701_10.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cg3701_10.jpg'}
{1: 'RImgBg1BlowUp'}
{1: "They are the forgotten, no longer anyone's concern.", 3: '60'}
{3: "They are the forgotten, no longer anyone's concern."}
{1: 'Filled with regret, confusion, and solitude are their deaths.', 3: '60'}
{3: 'Filled with regret, confusion, and solitude are their deaths.'}
{1: 'And the end they hoped to reach is still nowhere in sight.', 3: '60'}
{3: 'And the end they hoped to reach is still nowhere in sight.'}
{1: 'But at this moment—if this were the only moment they were given to do so...', 3: '60'}
{3: 'But at this moment—if this were the only moment they were given to do so...'}
{1: 'RImgBg1BlowUp'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory616.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory616.jpg'}
{3: 'Please allow us to chant the songs of old, turn those tunes into lengthy whale songs, and step onto a path of no return amidst these sighs.'}
{3: 'We have come thus far down the path that those who came before us had paved with their blood.'}
{3: "And now, I'm passing down to people coming after me this life that has only managed to make it this far because of all of you."}
{1: '—Even though we have become part of the Red Tide, our laments unanswered.', 3: '60'}
{3: '—Even though we have become part of the Red Tide, our laments unanswered.'}
{1: '—We will continue to search for our path even in death, marching in the parade as corpses.', 3: '60'}
{3: '—We will continue to search for our path even in death, marching in the parade as corpses.'}
